Sentencas: A series of iron- and/or aluminium-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates (ATLS) La9.83Si6-x-yAlxFeyO26 +/-delta (x = 0, 0.25, 0.75, and 1.5, y = 0, 025, 0.75, and 1.5) were synthesized using the mechanochemical activation (MA), solid state reaction (SSR), Pechini (Pe) and sol-gel (SG) methods.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The total conductivity of the prepared materials was measured under air in the temperature range 600-850 degrees C using 4-probe AC impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Its dependence on composition, synthesis method, sintering conditions and powder particle size was investigated.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates for SOFC applications

Sentencas: It was found that for electrolytes of the same composition, those prepared via mechanochemical activation exhibited the highest total specific conductivity, which was improved with increasing Al- and decreasing Fe-content.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The highest conductivity value at 700 degrees C. equal to 2.04 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates for SOFC applications

Sentencas: s cm(-1), was observed for the La9.83Si5Al0.75Fe0.25O26 +/-delta electrolyte.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates for SOFC applications

Sentencas: La9.83Si4.5Fe1.5O26 +/-delta electrolyte samples synthesized using the Pechini method exhibited higher conductivity when sintered conventionally than when spark-plasma sintering (SPS) was used.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates for SOFC applications
